trivia

Class Actors

  • java.lang.Object
    • trivia.Actors

  • public class Actors
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for all Actors. Handles updating and drawing of all contained Actors.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Actors(java.lang.Boolean debug)
      Creates a new container of Actor.

      • handleActors

        public void handleActors(int ms)
        Moves and checks for death all actors which are alive. Removes all dead actors.
